title: Mugs Aren't Just For Liquids, Make A Microwave Meal In Them
teaser: David Greene swaps recipes for cooking in a mug with Joe Yonan, author of the "Cooking for One" column for The Washington Post. (This piece initially aired on Feb. 25, 2013 on Morning Edition.)
